rfMicroneedling.subtitle: Your candidacy assessment has been received.
rfMicroneedling.bodyLine1: Our team will review your information and contact you.
rfMicroneedling.bodyLine2: If RF microneedling isn't the best option, we'll guide you to safer alternatives.

sculptra.subtitle: Your PLLA candidacy assessment has been received.
sculptra.bodyLine1: Our team will review your information and contact you.
sculptra.bodyLine2: If PLLA isn't the best option, we'll guide you to safer alternatives.

sculptraRf.subtitle: Your PLLA + RF package candidacy assessment has been received.
sculptraRf.bodyLine1: Our team will review your information and contact you.
sculptraRf.bodyLine2: If the package isn't the best option, we'll guide you to safer alternatives.

treatment.subtitle: Your request has been received.
treatment.bodyLine1: Our team will review your information and contact shortly.
treatment.bodyLine2: If your request needs additional details, we'll let you know.

whatsapp.intro: Hi, I'd like to request an appointment.
whatsapp.name: Name: {{name}}
